entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
